body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Open Hardware Summit 2020 is going virtual. The livestream link will be updated here on the day of the Summit (13th March 2020).","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The event will be running in EST (New York) time zone. This will be 5 hrs difference from Central European Time. Check out the schedule for the Virtual Summit agenda - ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://2020.oshwa.org/schedule/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"https://2020.oshwa.org/schedule/","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Enjoy a keynote from Sophi Kravitz discussing how open source has grown before diving into 11 more talks from open source hardware community members from across the globe.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We have Jeric Bautista talking about how we can reclaim plastic for 3D printing, Amanda Wozniak discussing how we can scale oshw and Ada Lovelace Fellow Lorena Ramírez López presenting on troubleshooting obsolete hardware in archives and museums.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We also have Michael Weinberg, Javier Serrano, Sean Montgomery, Junichi Akita, Robert Ryab-Silva, Patrica Alves Oliveira, Christopher Neidi, Matthew Parker, Tao Wang and libi rose striegl. Not to mention a panel on oshw progress and issues with Nadya Peek, Glenn Samala, Lenore M. Edman, Carl Richell and Christina Cyr.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"While we may not have expected to be online this year this is guaranteed to be an incredible day of celebrating open source hardware!","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
